command: $album = @{ userId=12; title="Brand Identities Portfolio" } | ConvertTo-Json; Invoke-RestMethod -Method Post -Uri "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/albums" -ContentType "application/json; charset=UTF-8" -Body $album | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 5
explanation: Creates a portfolio album to showcase work, reinforcing the persona’s professional credibility.
rationale_steps: Craft a portfolio container with a relevant title tied to the persona.
POST to the placeholder API to simulate portfolio setup and capture JSON for tracking.
